data.name: Kino's Journey -the Beautiful World- the Animated Series: Fields of Sheep
data.short_description: Framed by the warm sun, Kino passes through verdant, rocky plains. Beside the road, Kino spots some peaceful, napping sheep... who stand up and charge. A heated chase ensues until Kino is driven off a cliff by the herd of violent sheep.

fullgame.name: Kino's Journey -the Beautiful World- the Animated Series

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
